description: Try our easy to follow Kimchi recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pickles,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Kimchi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 spring onions, sliced on the diagonal

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 2 cups warm water and 1/3 cup salt flakes in a large bowl and stir to dissolve salt. Cut cabbage into 4cm squares and add to salt solution, mixing well to combine. Set aside for 3 hours or until cabbage begins to wilt. Drain and rinse well 3 times under cold running water.

Transfer drained cabbage to a clean bowl. Add remaining ingredients and mix well to combine. Transfer to a large sterilised jar, leaving a 3cm gap at top of jar. Seal with a lid and stand at room temperature for 3 days to ferment. The flavour will intensify with age (see tip).
